channel.title: Anti-Sniping Overlays [OUTDATED]
channel.description:
As many players have noticed people stream sniping, I spent some of my free time to create the following png's. I've made three themes in case someone decides to use them, they won't be as boring. I hope they are useful! :smiley:
### 1) Casual Overlay (the small block on the top left corner hiding the class and name can also be used as a face cam frame)
* [Default](http://tryphonx.deviantart.com/art/Throne-of-Lies-Overlay-Default-682071306) * [Light](http://tryphonx.deviantart.com/art/Throne-of-Lies-Overlay-Light-682071330) * [Dark](http://tryphonx.deviantart.com/art/Throne-of-Lies-Overlay-Dark-682071294)
### 2) Tryhard Snipers Overlay (hiding the chat too, in case you are part of the unseen or imprisoned and don't want your viewers to see what you say or who your partners in crime are)
* [Default](http://tryphonx.deviantart.com/art/Throne-of-Lies-Tryhard-Snipe-Overlay-Default-682072293) * [Light](http://tryphonx.deviantart.com/art/Throne-of-Lies-Tryhard-Snipe-Overlay-Light-682072365) * [Dark](http://tryphonx.deviantart.com/art/Throne-of-Lies-Tryhard-Snipe-Overlay-Dark-682071374)
### 3) Adjustable FaceCam Frame (if you want bigger facecam than the one in the anti-snipe overlays above)
http://tryphonx.deviantart.com/art/FaceCam-ToL-Frame-682071271
## I would recommend to use the download button to ensure 1080p resolution
If you want a more _personalized_ overlay (changing the inside of the blocks) or found something that doesn't look completely right you can send me a Direct Message on [Discord](https://discord.gg/qQazm4j) (TryphonX#9479 **aka** "üíÄ [color=CF1025]TryphonX[/color] üíÄ").
### [Last Updated on 27-Jul-17](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/anti-sniping-overlays/1764/6)

item.title: Anti-Sniping Overlays [OUTDATED]

Who needs to interact with chat anyways

item.title: Anti-Sniping Overlays [OUTDATED]
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
The rooms will most likely remain unique, but there might be an option to hide name tags in the night, since it has been requested a lot of times. But this is the best we can get right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Sniping Overlays [OUTDATED]
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
The overlays have been updated

Fixed:

  • The chat cover getting out of the boxes.
  • The class cover is now smaller (still covering the class, but not anything that doesn‚Äôt need to be covered, like it used to [for example: part of the journals])
(27-Jul-17)

Read full topic
